channel.title: Legacy: Life amongst the ruins. City on the Edge of Tomorrow
channel.description:
![wrecked%20london|690x388](upload://jF7Q9GOWMMe4qMQY5vJpcuO2waw.jpeg)
The city was dead to begin with. it's corpse spread over the land as far as anyone can see, the ruins of buildings rising like ribs from it's carcass. But although the city has died life has not left it.
Amongst the ruins life persists as new groups gather and new families form to forge the direct of this, and future, ages.
---
* We will be playing Legacy, Life amongst the ruins using the standard playset set amongst the ruins of a Metropolis. * This game will stretch over 2 months encompassing several ages. * We will be using Roll20.net to facilitate playing the game. * The X-card will be used. * Streamyards will be used for recording the session for Youtube.
Session 1 [date=2019-11-03 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-11-03 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] * https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp-NDrjQQmNdzCF_b4K
Session 2 [date=2019-11-10 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-11-03 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] * https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp-NTAlPzsnqn5QSOcS
Session 3 [date=2019-11-17 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-11-03 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] * https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp-Ng46tB7yiSPctcGn
Session 4 [date=2019-11-24 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-11-03 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] * https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp-Nrd95MDTXgQAHZia
Session 5 [date=2019-12-01 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-11-03 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] * https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp-OZhon-pWsv2c9Wct
Session 6 [date=2019-12-08 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-11-03 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] * https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp-Okv4hUOlV3ZKgf4Z
Session 7 [date=2019-11-03 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-11-03 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] * https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp-OzI3BUmyu4r52QQ2

item.title: Legacy: Life amongst the ruins. City on the Edge of Tomorrow
item.dc:creator: @GerwynWalters
item.description:
@GerwynWalters wrote:

The city was dead to begin with. it’s corpse spread over the land as far as anyone can see, the ruins of buildings rising like ribs from it’s carcass. But although the city has died life has not left it.

Amongst the ruins life persists as new groups gather and new families form to forge the direct of this, and future, ages.

  • We will be playing Legacy, Life amongst the ruins using the standard playset set amongst the ruins of a Metropolis.
  • This game will stretch over 2 months encompassing several ages.
  • We will be using Roll20.net to facilitate playing the game.
  • The X-card will be used.
  • Streamyards will be used for recording the session for Youtube.
